author: PlayStation
description:
From the world of Lost Eidolons comes an all-new roguelite tactical RPG. Awake on a mysterious island of damned souls, where your only hope of
survival lies in strategic combat. Choose your paths, allies, weapons, skills wisely in your quest to recover what's lost, braving death time and again.
Coming to PlayStation soon.

#ps5 #ps5games #playstation #LostEidolons #tacticsgame #roguelite #TRPG #turnbased #VeiloftheWitch
title: Lost Eidolons: Veil of the Witch - Coming to PlayStation | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Immerse yourself in a new Martian underground adventure with Blind Descent, an open-world survival craft game that unveils the mysteries of the Martian depths. Play solo or with friends as you search for the missing team. Adapt and mutate to survive in this bizarre alien world. To be released on PlayStation 5

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Blind Descent - Reveal trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Crisol: Theater of Idols is coming to PS5 later this year. Wishlist now on PlayStation. https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10014260

Crisol: Theater of Idols is a first-person horror/action game set in Hispania, a twisted version of Spain. Play as Gabriel, a soldier who uses blood as both weapon and lifeline. Explore the cursed island of Tormentosa, uncover dark secrets, and battle horrifying enemies. Will you survive? Crisol is developed by Vermila Studios and published by Blumhouse Games. 

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Crisol: Theater of Idols - Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
SLEEP AWAKE is coming to PS5 in 2026. Wishlist now on PlayStation. https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011233
In the last known city on Earth, people are disappearing in their sleep. Those who remain exist in a crisis of reckless experiments to keep awake. You must navigate depraved death cults, otherworldly forces, and the ever-present horror of The HUSH, to save yourself and those who rely upon you.

SLEEP AWAKE is developed by EYES OUT and published by Blumhouse Games. 

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Sleep Awake - Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Cairn's demo is out now! Play it on PlayStation 5 right now:  https://bit.ly/Cairn-PS5Demo
Wishlist Cairn: https://bit.ly/Cairn-PS5Store 

Reaching the summit of Kami is no easy feat. The high altitude means it’s perpetually iced over and in the snow, and makes your ascent even more dangerous. Ice climbing with your trusty ice axes and spikes will help you make it to the top.

Cairn features realistic simulation that allows you to climb intuitively, anywhere. Find the best holds and place your hands and feet seamlessly with simple controls. Adapt your posture, effort and balance - if you're not careful, you will fall!
title: Cairn - High Altitude Climbing Reveal | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
For the first time ever, you’ll get an exclusive look at what it’s like to fight fires as a team in Firefighting Simulator: Ignite – breaching doors, battling flames, and working together under pressure to save lives.  

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Firefighting Simulator: Ignite - Coop Gameplay Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011094

A HERO RESURRECTED. A NEW ADVENTURE.

Adventure of Samsara is a mysterious, 2D Metroidvania action-adventure that captures the spirit of the original Atari 2600 title, Adventure and takes it in an entirely new and unique direction.

With stunning, 2D pixel art, Adventure of Samsara combines classic gameplay, a deeply connected world, and a heady, twisting narrative of death, rebirth and memory. Developed by the Brazilian studio Ilex Games, players take control of the Solar Champion, a long-dead Plutonian resurrected by the primordial light of the Sun. Tasked with reactivating a mysterious interdimensional fortress, the Champion must restore balance to the multiverse.

Coming soon to PS4 and PS5.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Adventure of Samsara - Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
🌆 The wait is over: ANTRO has a release date! 🎮

Get ready to dive into the underground city of ANTRO, a dystopian Metroidvania where rhythm meets rebellion. Take on the role of Nittch and fight against the oppressive regime of La Cúpula using agility, parkour, and the power of urban music.

🗓️ ANTRO launches on the 27th of June
🏙️ Explore a society buried beneath tons of concrete.
🎶 Feel the rhythm as music shapes the gameplay.
🦾 Challenge authority in this dynamic, narrative-driven adventure.

https://store.playstation.com/es-es/product/EP6325-PPSA26056_00-0760564794314778

💥 Join the resistance. Free the underground.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Antro - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

description:
Journey to the far corners of the Earth and unearth ancient horrors in a Lovecraftian narrative puzzle adventure and sequel to 2020’s critically acclaimed Call of the Sea, coming soon to PlayStation 5.

title: Call of the Elder Gods - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
A new world. A new directive. 
 
The Cassiopeia’s mission to Tau Ceti f was meant to begin humanity’s next chapter. 
Instead, it may be the final one. 

As fear spreads and loyalties fracture, survival depends on one thing: who you trust.

Will Doyle, the Creative Director for Directive 8020, also introduces our new Turning Points feature. For the first time ever in The Dark Pictures, you’ll have the opportunity to go back and change the outcome of your choices. 

Can you save your crew, or will you seal their fate all over again? 

Directive 8020 releases October 2nd 2025 - Wishlist now on PlayStation 5.
title: Directive 8020 - Trust No-one Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Unleash water, harness elements, and trigger chain reactions in a fast-paced desert punk action-adventure. Shift and slide through surreal realities in a reactive world that rewards your creativity. Play as One, a young Legend on a quest to uncover her past — and reshape her future.

Wishlist on PlayStation Store and connect to the official Fading Echo Discord to join the community.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Fading Echo - Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
This is a story about death.

Available July 22 on PlayStation 5. Add it to your wishlist!
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008690

Luto is a psychological horror experience where you take on the role of someone unable to leave their home. Every attempt to escape will lead you deeper into the unknown, where nothing is as it seems and everything will test your senses.
• What lies behind loss: feel the void left by the absence of a loved one, where despair grows, fed by anxiety and depression. Day after day...
• Between reality and fiction: delve into an enigmatic place and explore its labyrinthine paths full of secrets. The truth has many faces, and you might not like the one you find.
• Will not let you go: experience unsettling terror that envelops your senses, with fears lurking around every corner. Darkness.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Luto - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
ECHOES OF THE END COMING TO PC AND CONSOLES THIS SUMMER

Echoes of the End follows Ryn, a powerful vestige born with volatile magical abilities, as she sets out to rescue her brother from a brutal empire on the brink of war. Alongside haunted scholar Abram Finlay, she must uncover a conspiracy that could reignite an ancient conflict and plunge the world of Aema into chaos.

Wishlist now!

Developed in Reykjavík, Iceland, Echoes of the End is the debut title from Myrkur Games, a studio founded by a close-knit group of storytellers and developers with a passion for cinematic worldbuilding.  

The trailer reveals the first in-depth look at its breathtaking world, powerful magic and emotional character-driven narrative. 

Driven by themes of trust, sacrifice and redemption, the story unfolds across ten hand-crafted chapters filled with cinematic moments, memorable characters and high-stakes decisions.

Published by Deep Silver, Echoes of the End is coming to PlayStation this summer.
#ps5
title: Echoes of the End - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Discover a truly ground-breaking VR experience in Reach, brought to life by nDreams Elevation. Featuring full-body immersion, next-gen physics and gesture-driven traversal, Reach is pushing the boundaries of action-adventure VR gameplay.

Delve into the unknown and make the leap this year.

#playstation #psvr2 #psvr2games #reach #announcement #ndreams
title: Reach - Official Announcement Trailer | PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Play Lynked: Banner of the Spark now on PlayStation 5!

Build a bright new world alongside a band of rescued robot buddies! In this colorful action RPG, battle waves of enemies in solo or co-op, then return home and use their parts to craft a thriving town. Assemble your crew and grow stronger with each new adventure!

Learn more at https://playlynked.com

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Lynked: Banner of the Spark - Future Games Show Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Herdling will stampede onto PlayStation 5 in Summer 2025.

Head out on a grand alpine expedition with a herd of loveable beasts, as you ascend a mountain path, encounter eerie dangers and surprising obstacles, and forge your way to the mystery at the summit. Guide a herd of mysterious creatures on a stirring and beautiful journey into the mountains… and beyond. 

Herdling is a brand new adventure from Okomotive, creators of the atmospheric and acclaimed FAR games, and Panic, publishers of Firewatch.

Learn more at herdling.game

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Herdling - Future Games Show & Demo Trailer | PS5 Games

description:
༻ Experience an isometric, narrative-driven stealth game and join Hanna’s adventure in the vibrant city of Eriksholm. The mysterious disappearance of her brother, Herman, ignites a chain of catastrophic events that will forever change their lives and the fate of the entire city. ༺ 

༻ https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009571/ ༺

title: Eriksholm: The Stolen Dream - Date Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
The award-winning survival horror classic is back!

Following the harrowing events at Wildberger Hospital, Caroline Walker hopes for a normal life with her sister, Anna. Yet in the months that follow, Anna is haunted by visions of violence and death, compelling her to create disturbing drawings that rapidly manifest into horrifying reality.

Desperate to free her of this affliction, Caroline travels to the remote town of Villa Hess and a mysterious clinic nestled deep within the mountains of southern Chile. But behind the warm smiles of the facility’s serene staff lies a sickening truth, and the sisters soon find themselves at the center of an entirely new nightmare…

Tormented Souls 2 is coming to PlayStation 5 in 2025, wishlist now!

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Tormented Souls 2 - 'Sisterhood' Story Teaser Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
After more than two decades, Milano's Odd Job Collection is finally coming to the west! This new release of the cozy retro classic expands upon the original pixel-art game with numerous quality-of-life improvements for a relaxing, highly replayable adventure working fun part-time jobs.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Milano's Odd Job Collection - Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Welcome home, Hobbit! Tales of the Shire launches on PS5 July 29th.

Explore The Shire, where you'll have new opportunities to savor and discover throughout the changing seasons. With the passage of time, enjoy new colorful landscapes, rhythms, and moments to cherish, all at just the right pace. Get a taste of Hobbit life in The Shire, filled with exploration, trade, and celebration of the small joys that make each day special! 

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Tales of the Shire - Gameplay Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

description:
Landing on PlayStation 5 this July 10th 2025.

The next chapter in the beloved minimalist city-building franchise is here. ISLANDERS: New Shores invites you back to a world of tranquil creativity, now reimagined with expanded gameplay, stunning visuals, and a host of fresh features that build on the charm of the original.

Whether you're a longtime fan or a newcomer, prepare to explore, build, and strategize like never before.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games

author: PlayStation
description:
lights 💡 camera 📸 grand larceny 💰

plan the perfect heist one photo at a time in Snap & Grab, coming to PlayStation®5 in 2026

Nifty Nevada is the world's most famous fashion photographer. She’s also the mysterious mastermind behind the world's most brazen unsolved heists. What’s her secret? Her loyal crew of henchmen keep her from ever lifting a beautiful, important finger!

As Nifty, you'll travel to exclusive and exotic locations, using your fashion photographer skills to take pictures of anything and everything you want to steal - as well as any complications or threats in the way.

Then, instead of committing any crimes yourself, assemble your photos to plan the perfect heist for your crew to execute! They are going to do a great job. Your plans won't cause complete chaos or have any problems. Don't worry about it!

Developed by No Goblin. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2025

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Snap & Grab - Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Possessor(s) is a fast-paced action side scroller with combat inspired by platform fighters, a story told through dangerous characters, set in a deep interconnected world ready for exploration.

Play as Luca, the host, and Rehm, her less-than-cooperative counterpart, as they explore a quarantined city ripped apart and flooded by an interdimensional catastrophe. Their only hope of survival is by learning to co-exist.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Possessor(s) - Foss Trailer | PS5 Games
